name: Dawn

weaponEffects.title: Guardian
weaponEffects.description: **[GROUP PLAY]** When using Re-entry, Form Switch, or Full Shot, take **40%** damage for your lowest HP ally and recover 10% of it back after **10** seconds. Only activates while using Fortitude Resonance and the effect cannot be removed early or reactivated until it ends.

weaponEffects.title: Amplify
weaponEffects.description: **[SOLO PLAY]** Mecha Form gains **50%** physical damage reduction.

weaponEffects.title: Omni Shield
weaponEffects.description:
Mecha basic attack/Double Smash/Impact Slash will give **1** point of Mecha Energy. At **20** points, convert **20%** of your current HP into a [Omni Shield] with **1.5x** your max HP (cannot exceed 1.5x max HP and healing is reduced by 50% while active). The shield lasts for **15** seconds and cannot be gained if you are below **10%** HP.

After the duration, **66.7%** of the remaining shield value is converted to HP, and hitting a weak target nets **2** points of energy.

When triggering the effect, convert active HP shields into [Omni Shield]. Other HP shields cannot be obtained while active.

advancements: Activating Re-entry, Form Switch, or Full Shot will instantly grant [Omni Shield].
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
When [Omni Shield] breaks or refreshes, increase final damage by **35%** for **20** seconds, does not stack.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
When [Omni Shield] breaks or refreshes, inflict **160%** of ATK + **5%** of lost HP to nearby targets and gains **50** weapon charge points on hit.

While [Omni Shield] is active, Physical Resistance is **doubled** and provides Dominance effect. [Omni Shield] can be obtained when another Weapon Skill or Discharge Skill hits the target while the shield is active.

abilities.name: Hunter Attack
abilities.description: While on the ground, perform 4 basic attacks in a row.

abilities.name: Wild Hunter Punch
abilities.description: Use a normal attack while in the air, which can trigger a heavy attack and cause damage to the target hit. Dealing **108.4%** of ATK + **6** damage and knocks the target back.

abilities.name: Heavy Punch
abilities.description:
When in the Mech form, perform basic attack five times in a row, hitting the same target 4 times adds a weakness lasting for 20 seconds, not stackable.

After switching back to the original form, perform 5 basic attacks in a row, adding a weakness status to the targets, dealing increased damage of 10%. The effect lasts for 20 second.
breakdown:
Mech form: **70.7%** of ATK + **4** and small knockback.

Original form: **87.6%** of ATK + **5** and small knockback.

Mech form: *38.7%** of ATK + **2** and small knockback.

Original form: **48.2%** of ATK + **3** and small knockback.

Mech form: *109.4%** of ATK + **6** and small knockback.

Original form: **185.5%** of ATK + **10** and small knockback.

Mech form: *129.6%** of ATK + **7** and small knockback.

Original form: **151.9%** of ATK + **8** and small knockback.

Mech form: *188.5%** of ATK + **10** and **launch** the target.

Original form: **365.3%** of ATK + **19** and **launch** the target.

abilities.name: Double Smash
abilities.description: Hold Attack while jumping or when in the air to trigger a Mech Heavy Strike. When landing, causes damage to nearby targets equal to **135.4%** of ATK + **7** damage and controls the **floating** target. The higher the distance from the ground when triggered, the higher the damage, up to **600%** damage.

abilities.name: Shoulder-gun Fire
abilities.description: Hold attack while in Mech form to launch 3 missiles. Hitting a target deals **17.8%** of ATK + **1** damage, the explosion deals **26.7%** of ATK + **1** damage.

abilities.name: Impact Slash
abilities.description:
Press and hold the attack to trigger the branch attack during the general attack.

When in Mech form, leap up and hit the ground, dealing **250.3%** of ATK + **13** damage to nearby targets and force control the floating targets.

When in original form, sprint forward, dealing **254.5%** of ATK + **13** damage to targets along the way and forcibly controlling flying targets.

abilities.name: Wild Hunter Shot
abilities.description: Use the pistol to aim at the target and shoot, dealing **23.9%** of ATK + **1** damage to the target.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Mecha Collision
abilities.description: In the short window after dodging, tap the basic attack to trigger Mecha Collision. Deals **149.1%** of ATK + **8** damage to the target along the way, and knocks the target back slightly.

abilities.name: Mecha Entry
abilities.description:
The Mecha will jump down, dealing **395.3%** of ATK + **21** damage to surrounding targets, and **strongly suspends** targets, with a **20**-second cooldown.

Passive: In the Mech form, become immune to the rigidity effect, and other sources other than the uncontrolled source cannot be used.

abilities.name: Form Switch
abilities.description: The Mecha leaps down, dealing **395.3%** of ATK + **21** damage and  **strongly suspending** surrounding targets before switching forms. Cooldown **20** seconds.

abilities.name: Full Bomb Launch
abilities.description:
When a ***weapon is fully charged*** or triggers ***Phantasia***, switching to this weapon from another weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder** and releases a large number of missiles, dealing **513.3%** of ATK + **27** damage to the target.

Passive: In the Mech form, become immune to control effects, but cannot use any relic other than those that free you from control effects.

recommendedMatrices.name: Marc
recommendedMatrices.description: Excellent utility effects that apply to team members as well. Use 4 pieces for the damage buff, or 2 pieces for just the life shield.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Increases Dawn's overall damage and shatter.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
